0.title: About AnkiLingoFlash
0.content: AnkiLingoFlash is an web browser extension aiming to make language learning more accessible, efficient, and enjoyable for everyone. It has been designed to help you reach your language learning goals faster than ever before. Get Started Now .

1.title: Author
1.content: AnkiLingoFlash was created by Victor Piriou. | LinkedIn: Victor Piriou | Email: piriouvictor [at] gmail [dot] com | .

4.title: üöÄ Master a New Language in Months, Not Years: Use AnkiLingoFlash for Quickly Building a Strong Vocabulary Foundation

6.title: Configuring AnkiLingoFlash
6.content: After installing Anki-Connect and AwesomeTTS, you need to configure AnkiLingoFlash to choose how you‚Äôll use the extension. Here‚Äôs how to do it: . | Click on the AnkiLingoFlash icon in your browser toolbar to open the extension popup. | In the popup, you‚Äôll see two options: . | Free trial: Start with a limited number of free flashcards. | Own credits: Use your own OpenAI API credits for unlimited flashcards. | . | If you choose the free trial: . | Click on the Sign in with Google button. | Follow the prompts to authenticate with your Google account. | Once logged in, you‚Äôll see a welcome message and the number of free flashcards remaining. | . | If you choose to use your own credits: . | You‚Äôll need to use your own OpenAI API key, which is very cost-effective (a dollar can generate thousands of flashcards). | Follow these steps to create and use an OpenAI API key: . a. Create an OpenAI Account: Go to the ChatGPT website and sign up for an account. b. Generate an API Key: . | Navigate to the API keys section. | Click on ‚ÄúCreate new secret key‚Äù. | Choose a name for your key, such as ‚ÄúAnkiLingoFlash‚Äù. | Click on ‚ÄúCreate secret key‚Äù. | Note down the generated key. | . c. Add Funds to Your Account: . | In the OpenAI dashboard, go to the ‚ÄúSettings‚Äù menu. | Navigate to the ‚ÄúBilling‚Äù section. | Add a minimum of $5 USD (or equivalent) to your account. | . d. Use the API Key in AnkiLingoFlash: . | Copy your API key and paste it into the settings of the AnkiLingoFlash extension. | . | . | Select the language for definitions and mnemonics: . | Choose from available options: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese (Portugal), German, Italian, or Danish. | . | . Note: If you‚Äôre unsure about using your own credits, don‚Äôt worry! Even if you don‚Äôt generate enough flashcards to use the entire $5, you can still use the remaining credits in OpenAI‚Äôs playground or for other AI-powered tools and experiments. Fantastic progress! Now that you‚Äôve configured AnkiLingoFlash, it‚Äôs time to put it to use! Let‚Äôs move on to Generating Your First Flashcard.

8.title: Configuring the Text-to-Speech Tool
8.content: To add pronunciation guides to your flashcards, you need to configure the text-to-speech tool for your target language. Follow these steps: . | Generate your first flashcard as described in the previous step. | In Anki, go to Tools > Manage Note Types. | You should see the flashcard type corresponding to the language of the word or phrase you selected. For example, if you selected an English term, look for AnkiLingoFlash_English [1 note]. | Select the appropriate card type and click on Cards‚Ä¶. | In the card editor: . | Check the Back Template. | Click on OK to dismiss any message that appears. | Click on Add TTS. | . | Configure the text-to-speech service: . | Select the service you want to use. For example, for English, you can choose the free local service Youdao Dictionary. | Choose the appropriate voice (e.g., English, American [default] for English). | Click on Save, then on OK. | . | Set up the TTS fields: . | For the Field option, select Selection. | For the Language field, select the desired language for text-to-speech. | . | Finalize the setup: . | Click on Insert into Back Template. | Close the message that appears by clicking on OK. | In the Back Template, find the line [Text-to-speech not yet configured] and replace it with the line that was just added (it should contain the TTS tag). | Click on Save. | . | . Important: You will need to repeat this process for each language you wish to learn. Congratulations! You have now completely finished setting up AnkiLingoFlash. You can now review the first word or phrase you added to Anki, or continue to add other flashcards.

10.title: Generating Your First Flashcard
10.content: Now that you‚Äôve installed and configured AnkiLingoFlash, it‚Äôs time to generate and add your first flashcard to Anki. Follow these steps: . | Select a word or phrase on a recently loaded web page. | Right-click on the selected term. This will open the context menu. | Click on Generate a flashcard in the context menu. This action will trigger AnkiLingoFlash to create a new flashcard. | Follow the on-screen instructions to create and add the flashcard to an Anki deck. | . Great job on creating your first flashcard! The final step is to Configure the Text-to-Speech Tool to add pronunciation guides to your flashcards.

12.title: Getting Started with AnkiLingoFlash
12.content: Follow the steps below to begin your journey with AnkiLingoFlash: . | Install AnkiLingoFlash. | Set-up AnkiLingoFlash . | . Happy learning with AnkiLingoFlash! .

14.title: Transform Your Web Browsing into Language Learning
14.content: Supercharge your Anki experience with the AnkiLingoFlash browser extension.

15.title: Experience the power of AnkiLingoFlash:
15.content: . | Install our browser extension with a single click | Browse your favorite websites as usual | Right-click on any words or phrases you want to learn | Instantly receive AI-generated flashcards without leaving your browser! | . Install Now .

17.title: Unique Features
17.content: . | AI-Powered Flashcards: Create comprehensive flashcards with definitions, mnemonics, and pronunciation guides. | Seamless Anki Integration: Generate and add cards to Anki directly from your browser, without typing and disrupting your daily routine. | Personalized Learning: Create personalized flashcard sets tailored to your interests, no more downloading uncertain quality decks. | . Integrate AnkiLingoFlash into your daily browsing routine and watch your vocabulary grow day by day.

19.title: Installing Anki-Connect
19.content: Anki-Connect is crucial for AnkiLingoFlash to communicate with your Anki application. Here‚Äôs how to install it: . | Open Anki and go to Tools > Add-ons > Get Add-ons‚Ä¶ | Enter the code 2055492159 and click OK. | A message prompting you to restart Anki should appear; close it by clicking on OK. | Go to Tools > Add-ons | Double-click on AnkiConnect in the add-ons list. | Replace the entire configuration with the following: | . { "apiKey": null, "apiLogPath": null, "ignoreOriginList": [], "webBindAddress": "127.0.0.1", "webBindPort": 8765, "webCorsOriginList": [ "chrome-extension://hicnjnfcmjfnomdfmekhigghmlkmachb", "http://localhost/*", "https://*/*" ] } . Very nice! Now that you‚Äôve installed Anki-Connect, let‚Äôs move on to the next step: Installing AwesomeTTS.

21.title: Installing AwesomeTTS
21.content: AwesomeTTS is a powerful text-to-speech tool for Anki, necessary for adding vocal pronunciation guides to your flashcards. Here‚Äôs how to install it: . | In Anki, go to Tools > Add-ons > Get Add-ons‚Ä¶ | Enter the code 1436550454 and click OK | Restart Anki when prompted | . Excellent! With AwesomeTTS installed, you‚Äôre ready for the next step: Configuring AnkiLingoFlash.

23.title: Installing AnkiLingoFlash
23.content: Follow these simple steps to install the AnkiLingoFlash browser extension: . | Visit the Chrome Web Store | Click on the ‚ÄúAdd to Chrome‚Äù button | Follow the prompts to add the extension to your browser | Once installed, you‚Äôll see the AnkiLingoFlash icon in your browser toolbar | . Note: AnkiLingoFlash is currently available for Google Chrome. Support for other major browsers, including Microsoft Edge and Firefox, will be rolled out in the coming weeks. Very good work! Now, learn how to set-up AnkiLingoFlash.

25.doc: Quick Tutorial for Setting Up AnkiLingoFlash
25.title: Quick Tutorial for Setting Up AnkiLingoFlash
25.content: Follow the steps below to set up AnkiLingoFlash. It won‚Äôt take you more than 5 minutes. | Install Anki-Connect . | Install AwesomeTTS . | Configure AnkiLingoFlash . | Generate Your First Flashcard . | Configure Text-to-Speech Tool . | .
